summary: In this context, ethylbenzene and terephthalate are mentioned in relation to the selection of polymers for the uptake and release of BTEX (benzene, toluene, ethylbenzene, and xylene) in a bioreactor system. Poly(butylene terephthalate) is one of the polymers tested for its properties in this application. However, there is no direct interaction or functional relationship discussed between ethylbenzene and terephthalate beyond their inclusion in the polymer selection process.
